name: Shadow Glass
description:
Click to start the game up.

Shadow Glass: Alice Story is the setup to the Shadow Glass series. What happens to Alice is what jump starts the rest of the story.

We have worked to craft a story of intrigue and that of the supernatural.

Alice traveled down to Blackbel to attend the University of Golden Oak with her boyfriend Matt. Blackbel is considered one of the historic cities to still be around so is shrouded in dark history. This is her first year attending there, so she is trying to adjust to college life and quietness of the city. The first 2 semesters she wasn't happy with her grades in her Calculus, Cryptology and Biology. So with the start of the new semester she started spending her weekends in the library going on the stuff she has trouble with. 

That is where this story begins

Narrator

The narrator is there to deliver what is transpiring in the story. But some parts of the story needs your direction. The Narrator story is by what you decide. Information is given if you choose to receive it but the narrator will not offer any guidance. Of course when you complete the run through the first time it will offer you to jump back to certain points either to get more information to the story or change the decision that was made. Some things no matter what you may chose is left to fate.

Alice

The protagonist of this story that finds herself in the library on the campus to study on a few courses she is failing in. On a Friday night that is. Alice is silent most of the time. Her roommate Robyn, who she usually hangs out with when she isn't with Matt is more of the outgoing one of the two.

Johnathan

One of University of Golden Oaks elite students for the Development of Future Engineers. Johnathan is considered very laid back and shy majority of the time. He tries to open up to Alice whenever she is around.

Makali

Working in the library 3-5 times a week. Makali usually helps Johnathan with keeping things in order in the college library. She is often considered the assistant to the head librarian.

Waitress - Jubi

A junior at University of Golden Oaks. She usually finds when she isn't taking classes she is working at the campus diner. She is friendly but tends to be too serious at times.

--

This Visual Novel will take you through the experience of a group of college students trying to figure out what is going on with missing people and how to stop it.
